pages.text: Rayonnoceras is a Carboniferous orthocone cephalopod. Its large straight shell had many rings on it and it had a canal system within its siphuncle. Its orientation during life would have been horizontal, like some other orthocones that preceded it.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Eggs
